nodes.text: Kirlocca's funeral was a remembrance ceremony that was held in the Cularin system in around 21 BBY to celebrate the life of Kirlocca, a Wookiee Jedi Master who was killed while confronting the Dark Jedi Raik Muun. Various senior dignitaries from across the system attended the event and several non-lethal combat competitions were staged during the proceedings to honor Kirlocca's excellence in life as a combat instructor.
